## Documentation Request

**What topic needs documentation?**
A clear description of what documentation is needed.

**Where should it go?**
- [ ] Getting Started
- [ ] Core Concepts
- [ ] API Reference
- [ ] Patterns
- [ ] Examples
- [ ] Troubleshooting
- [ ] Other: ___________

**Why is this documentation important?**
Explain why this would help the community.

**Do you have example code or resources?**
If you have any code examples, links, or resources that could help create this documentation, please share them.

**Are you willing to contribute this documentation?**
- [ ] Yes, I can write this
- [ ] No, but I can review it
- [ ] No, I'm just requesting it
